mapper.select: SELECT m.user_no AS userNo, m.name AS name FROM tb_team_member tm JOIN tb_member m ON tm.user_no = m.user_no WHERE tm.team_no = #{teamNo} AND m.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY m.user_no
SELECT tm.team_no, team_name, create_date FROM TB_TEAM_MEMBER tm JOIN TB_TEAM t ON tm.team_no = t.team_no WHERE tm.user_no = #{userNo} AND tm.delete_yn = 'N';

SELECT tt.team_name, ti.create_date, ti.team_no, ti.invited_id, inv.name AS inviter_name FROM TB_INVITED ti JOIN TB_MEMBER me ON me.email = ti.invited_email LEFT JOIN TB_TEAM tt ON tt.team_no = ti.team_no JOIN TB_MEMBER inv ON inv.user_no = ti.user_no WHERE me.user_no = #{userNo} AND ti.group_no = 'F001' ORDER BY ti.create_date DESC;
